sentences.en: A person who plays the viola is called a violist.
sentences.cn: 演奏中提琴的人叫作中提琴手.

sentences.en: Adagio and Rondo for glass harmonica, flute, oboe, viola, and cello.
sentences.cn: 为玻璃乐器, 长笛, 双簧管, 中提琴, 与大提琴的慢版与轮旋曲.

sentences.en: All these people happen to be playing the violin, viola,or what have you next to you.
sentences.cn: 这些人不只是碰巧在你身边，演奏小提琴或中提琴。

sentences.en: European viola with an unusually long corolla spur.
sentences.cn: 欧洲堇菜,通常有长花冠距.

sentences.en: I was wondering: Do you still have my music school viola there?
sentences.cn: 我想知道: 你那儿还留着我音乐学校的琴 吗 ?

sentences.en: Other individual lessons include piano, violin, viola, flute, piano accompaniment, and voice.
sentences.cn: 其他个人班包括钢琴, 小提琴, 中提琴, 长笛, 钢琴伴奏, 和发声法.

sentences.en: She hated his music and his viola.
sentences.cn: 她恨他的音乐和他的中提琴.

sentences.en: She plays the violin, I mean the viola, really well.
sentences.cn: 她的小提琴, 我是指中提琴, 的确拉得很好.

sentences.en: She saw displeasure with perplexity expressed in Viola's face.
sentences.cn: 她看到薇奥拉脸上露出既困惑又不高兴的神色.

sentences.en: The viola is a stringed instrument.
Two minutes later, Viola will also have an opportunity, Gilardino attempted header.
sentences.cn: 两分钟后紫百合也有机会, 吉拉迪诺头球攻门偏出.

sentences.en: Viola : OK . What is the lacrosse team doing on our field?
sentences.cn: 怎么,长曲棍球队在我们球场里做 什么 ?

sentences.en: Viola De Lesseps: So, my lord? I speak with him every day.
sentences.cn: 那又如何呢, 大人? 我天天同他谈话.

sentences.en: Viola did not fail to mark the words of the old song.
sentences.cn: 薇奥拉果然留意了这支古老歌曲的词儿.

sentences.en: Viola disguised herself as a boy named Thomas Kent.
sentences.cn: 维奥拉乔扮成男子托马斯·肯特.

sentences.en: We usually have more callous on the left hand, and the viola is bigger.
sentences.cn: 主要是我们的左手经常会磨出硬茧, 而且中提琴的尺寸也要稍微大一点.

trans.tran_cn: 中提琴，中提琴演奏者，<植>堇菜属植物，[女名]维奥拉
trans.tran_en: a wooden musical instrument that you play like a violin but that is larger and has a lower sound
